title: Im done being bad at league. Can someone teach me to play better?
body: I've played about 400 hours of league, and I dont feel like Im getting any better. I dont want someone to boost me, I just want to know what I'm doing wrong and how to improve on it. I'm currently bronze 3 and Im not expecting to climb out of elo hell, just be better prepared for season 7.

replies.body:
Yasei Doubutsu is a league youtuber who helps bronze players  improve definitely add him and ask for a spectate
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC8x_OF9Fo1vb8NkaASrXaXQ

I just saw this, and was about to post.
The funny thing is both you and Rony are in the club XD
Lol never have to worry about recruiting we got that for you
lol. YES... Go my Acolytes. Go and take over the forums!
Fucking played against or with you once. I dont remember haha

Could always just go through match history.
That would take awhile XD
R I P, you name does seem familiar.

> [{quoted}](name=Vexenite,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=2O5kNnoB,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-10-20T08:02:02.030+0000)
>
> I&#039;ve played about 400 hours of league, and I dont feel like Im getting any better. I dont want someone to boost me, I just want to know what I&#039;m doing wrong and how to improve on it. I&#039;m currently bronze 3 and Im not expecting to climb out of elo hell, just be better prepared for season 7.

This!! is an example of those rare people who will get better and climb eventually.
Dont worry man. The hardest part of a bronze player to climb is to realise that they need to stop doing what they usually do and start learning.. and you know what? You have that already. The remaining are the learning part and time. You are on the right track!

Add me man. I'd love to have a chat with you or spectating your game for input
Note: I am at gold

I can shamelesly plug my guide to get out of bronze, as well ... 

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/88ATNtFV-guide-how-to-get-out-of-bronzesilver-tier-season-6-version

but if you want particular notes for your specific case, I could always check your profile : 
http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Vexenite+

and the general verdict is that you need to primarily get better at 3 things :
 - die less
- farm more
- itemize according to the game at hand and not a particular champion guide

read the links above and I can elaborate if you'd like :) 

P.S. 
a fast way to decide which is a safe move and which is not is by constantly asking yourself "would I be doing this if I didn't have flash .?." 
Play a whole game by pretending that your flash is always on cooldown and use it only when the opponents force you to do it and try to notice the difference on which plays are safe and which are not worth the risk ...

If you haven't already, you should totally check out Yaiamone's _[Playing like a god but still can't climb? (part 1)](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/E5KPW5Qx-playing-like-a-god-but-still-cant-climb-part-1)_ and _[10 Tips to Reduce Your Death Count](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/tBNPdREA-10-tips-to-reduce-your-death-count)_ pinned right here on the Gameplay & Strategy board. Not only are the posts themselves a great place to start but the discussions below offer some alternative viewpoints and a place to ask for any clarification if you need it.

I learned a thing or two looking at the leaguecraft vids from unsw lolsoc.

Biggest change I think I had was the idea that you dont always have to ruin the carries but it is fine to focus the tank as long as their carries arent wailing on you.
Wow thanks for the help guys, I'll be sure to add you. I'd prefer if I got a chance to play a game where I play for real though, as if you watch some older ones sometimes I do dumb things for fun.
